General.Name: Bank of Suzhou
General.Description: Bank of Suzhou Co., Ltd. provides commercial banking products and services in Suzhou. The company operates through Corporate Business, Personal Business, Treasury Business, and Other Business segments. It offers various deposits, loans, consumer credit and mortgage loans, and personal asset management, investment banking, debit cards, settlement, trade-related products, and other services. The company also engages in the foreign exchange transactions, continuing foreign exchange derivatives transactions, interbank deposit/loaning, resale/repurchase, investment, and other self-operated and agency businesses; treasury business; issuance short-term, medium-term and long-term loans; handling of domestic settlement, and bill acceptance and discount; interbank lending; bank card business; issuing, redeeming, and underwriting of government bonds; collection and payment, and insurance business; credit investigation, consulting, and witness business; financial leasing business; transfer of financial leasing assets; fixed-income securities investment business; acceptance of lease deposits from lessees; absorption of fixed deposits; borrowing from financial institutions; overseas borrowing; lease sale and disposal business; and economic consulting. In addition, it provides safe deposit boxes, foreign exchange loans and remittance, foreign exchange settlement and sale, public securities investment funds, and custody of securities investment funds. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Suzhou, China.
